translation.en: [woman] I'm sick of it, sis. I can't breathe here.
translation.ko: 지긋지긋해, 언니 여기선 숨을 못 쉬겠어

translation.en: [sister] What is up with you? Cheryl, calm down.
No, they… they look at you like you're worthless!
translation.ko: 그것들이 날 하찮은 인간 취급 하면서

translation.en: They make you stand there and wait,
like you're some sort of reprobate or something.
Like you're shit on the sole of their shoe!
[sister] Who makes you wait? You're not making any sense.
translation.ko: 누가 널 기다리게 한단 거야? 말이 되게 얘기해

translation.en: Is this… one of your dips?
I was down there earlier asking for help with the rent.
You and Michael need to stop living fancy off those credit cards.
translation.ko: 너랑 마이클은 신용 카드로 사치 부리는 것부터 끊어야 해

translation.en: [Cheryl] I won Saleswoman of the Year three times in a row!
translation.ko: 난 올해의 판매원으로 연속 세 번이나 뽑혔어

translation.en: -[baby crying] -[Cheryl] I shouldn't be where I am now!
[sister] Carl! Go check on your sister.
Is it wrong to want more?

translation.ko: 누구나 더 많은 걸 원해, 셰릴

translation.en: [sighing] But we're dealt the cards we're dealt.
You've… just… gotta… make the most of things.
translation.ko: 그 안에서 최선을 다하는 수밖에 없어

translation.en: Now, what time you popping round later?
translation.ko: 너 이따 몇 시에 들를 거야?

translation.en: I'll see you at five, yeah?
[machine] Hello. Your call cannot be taken at the moment,
translation.ko: 안녕하세요 지금은 전화를 받을 수 없으니

translation.en: so please leave your message after the tone.
translation.ko: 삐 소리가 들린 후 메시지를 남겨 주세요

translation.en: [machine] Hello. Your call cannot be taken at the moment,
translation.ko: "미용실에 다녀올게, C" 지금은 전화를 받을 수 없으니

translation.en: so please leave your message after the tone.
translation.ko: 삐 소리가 들린 후 메시지를 남겨 주세요

translation.en: -[phone beeps] -[man impatiently] Cheryl, where are you?
[under breath] Wonderful morning. [aloud] Wonderful morning, isn't it?
And you're looking just divine, as usual.
You coming to my charity gala this Friday? We're opening up the doors.
translation.ko: 이번 주 금요일에 제가 여는 자선 행사에 오실 건가요? - 집에서 진행할 거예요 - 재밌겠네요!
- 감비아의 장애인들을 위한 거죠 - 좋은 일이네요

translation.en: -[woman] Sounds splendid. -Shall I put you down for 500?
translation.ko: - 감비아의 장애인들을 위한 거죠 - 좋은 일이네요 500 기부하신다고 적어 둘까요?

translation.en: Oh… no, of course. 550 even. Happy to help.
[Neve] Well, can't we add more? We want a full house.
translation.ko: 더 올 사람 없어? 손님이 꽉 차야 해

translation.en: [man] I work in insurance, hon, not hospitality.
translation.ko: 난 보험 회사에서 일하지 파티 업체 직원이 아니야

translation.en: These things carry weight in the community.
translation.ko: 이런 행사가 지역에서 얼마나 영향력을 갖는데

translation.en: I've been working towards this for so long.
-[Neve] How's she getting on? -[woman] Oh, she's a treat.
Isn't she just? What's happened to your hair, darling?
Trends are always changing, aren't they?
[woman] Will you be wanting anything for your event?
Mary's been telling me all about it. A signed choir?
translation.ko: 메리한테 얘기 들었어요 수어 합창을 한다죠?

translation.en: Oh, yes. The Dream of Gerontius by Elgar. The journey of a dead man's soul.
translation.ko: 네, 엘가의 '제론티우스의 꿈'을 공연할 거예요 사후 영혼의 여정을 그린 곡이죠

translation.en: I'll pick up some expensive shampoo later and run you a nice bath.
translation.ko: 이따 비싼 샴푸 사서 따뜻한 목욕물 받아 줄게

translation.en: When you came here, you didn't even know what a village fête was.
translation.ko: 처음 여기 왔을 땐 지역 축제가 뭔지도 모르더니

translation.en: Now look at you. Throwing your very own gala!
translation.ko: 이젠 자선 행사를 여는 사람이 됐네

translation.en: -Well, you must've inspired me. -[chuckles] I'd like to think so.
translation.ko: - 자기가 좋은 자극이 됐나 봐 - 그런 거면 좋겠네

translation.en: You're a real example of fortitude, Neve.
I understand the impulse to want to give back.
It's bringing it all together, my time here.
translation.ko: 내가 여기서 보낸 시간을 총정리하는 의미도 있어

translation.en: And an opportunity to show off the new kitchen.
But, Neve, really, come on, there's nothing to prove here.
translation.ko: 근데 니브 굳이 뭔가를 증명할 필요는 없어
넌 우리의 일원이나 마찬가지야 - 마찬가지? - 무슨 말인지 알잖아

translation.en: And you are drop-dead gorgeous. You haven't aged a bit.
translation.ko: 게다가 넌 눈에 띄는 미인이고 늙지도 않았어

translation.en: Thank you very much. Excuse me. Gotta go to the loo.
translation.ko: 고마워, 잘 마셨어 잠깐 화장실 좀 다녀올게

translation.en: [Neve] Need help with anything in there, sweetheart?
[Neve] You wouldn't believe what happened to me today. -In the car. -[footsteps approaching]
translation.ko: 오늘 차에서 무슨 일이 있었는지 말해 줘도 못 믿을 거야

translation.en: -[boy] Anyone seen my poster? -What poster? Ian.
translation.ko: 제 포스터 보셨어요? 무슨 포스터? 이언?

translation.en: [boy] The Lil Wayne one? In the gym?
-Your mum's telling a story. -It's just disappeared, then?
translation.ko: - 네 엄마가 얘기 중이었어 - 그럼 그냥 사라졌다고요?

translation.en: So, yes, I'd just had tea with Amanda, and I…
-[Neve] No phones at the table, Mary. -Sorry.
So I'm driving along, when I see someone dodgy from out of town,
translation.ko: 운전을 하고 있는데 수상한 외지인이 보이는 거야

translation.en: straight into the back of Sonia's car. Near tore off her entire bumper.
translation.ko: 소니아 차 뒤쪽을 박았다니까 범퍼가 떨어져 나갈 뻔했어

translation.en: We just hired a girl from out of town.
What was her name? This girl?
Told you before. It was a side job for a bit when I was 15.
translation.ko: 전에도 말했잖아 15살 때 잠깐 아르바이트로 했었다고

translation.en: Are we giving him enough space to, I dunno…
translation.ko: 우리가 충분한 자유를 주고 있는 건가 싶어서

translation.en: Speaking of which, I just pre-ordered him the new Xbox for his birthday.
translation.ko: 말이 나와서 말인데 생일 선물로 신상 엑스박스도 선주문 넣었어

translation.en: What's wrong with the one he has?
[Ian] You don't have to cover it up.
I know I don't have to.
[Ian] I used to love the way you had it before.
Well, thanks for letting your feelings be known.
Come on, you know what I mean.
Let's go to sleep, shall we?
I'll be in in a mo.
Sebas, have you been drawing on the mirrors?
[man] Castle Combe School has, yet again,
outperformed other private schools across the country.
translation.ko: 전국 사립 학교들 중 가장 좋은 성과를 냈습니다

translation.en: And, for the fifth year in a row,
our deputy head and theology course leader, Mrs. Williams,
translation.ko: 우리 학교 교감이자 신학 강사이신 윌리엄스 씨가

translation.en: has outdone us all with the most A-stars this senior year.
translation.ko: 우리 모두를 제치고 이번 졸업반에서 가장 많은 A*를 배출했습니다

translation.en: [man] Even if she still hasn't given in her references.
[laughs] Well, I'd accept another medal, but I'm currently out of wall space.
translation.ko: 상패야 또 받고 싶지만 이제 벽에 자리가 없네요

translation.en: Come on, girls! This isn't a photo shoot.
-Shouldn't you be in class? -Yeah, I'm on my way.
translation.ko: - 교실에 있어야 하지 않니? - 가는 중이에요

translation.en: Well, then. Instead of talking to strangers.
translation.ko: 그럼 얼른 들어가 낯선 사람이랑 말 섞지 말고

translation.en: Have you got your phone on you? [Sebastian] Maybe.
Keep it on. In case I need to get hold of you.
translation.ko: 갖고 있어 내가 연락할 수도 있으니까

translation.en: "Who?" This is the game you wanna play with me?

translation.ko: - 제가 샀어요 - 내가 바보인 줄 알아?

translation.en: Don't treat me like a fool! I can suspend you, young man.
translation.ko: - 제가 샀어요 - 내가 바보인 줄 알아? 난 널 정학시킬 수도 있어

translation.en: Don't forget, I am your mother and the headmistress.
translation.ko: 잊지 마 난 네 엄마이자 교장이야

translation.en: [breathes anxiously] Basketball, yes. Of course. Basketball.
-Are you all right? -Yes, yes, I'm fine. I'm fine.
-I'll see you later. -Jessie's dropping you back?
[impatiently] Yes, Mum. Yes. Love you. Bye.
[Amanda] Hello, my darling. Sorry we're late. [Ian] No worries.

translation.ko: - 배리가 머리 손질 하느라요 - 웃긴 친구네

translation.en: [Amanda] Wow, the spices. Really, so yummy.
I don't know how you do it, Neve.
Barry's always complaining about my boiled chicken.
translation.ko: 배리는 내 닭 요리 맛없다고 항상 불평하거든

translation.en: -Is he? -[Amanda] You have to teach me.
translation.ko: - 그래? - 응, 자기가 좀 가르쳐 줘

translation.en: You'll have to teach me one of your secret concoctions.
translation.ko: 그 비법 양념도 알려줘야 할 거야

translation.en: -We could make a night of it. -We could.
He's talking about things that the mainstream media are scared to touch.
translation.ko: 주류 언론이 꺼내기 두려워하는 주제들을 얘기해

translation.en: "White flight." That's how he phrased it on the podcast.
-What is it? -[Ian] Can we talk about something else?
translation.ko: - 그게 무슨 뜻이야? - 다른 얘기나 할까?

translation.en: It's when white people flee urban areas for the suburbs.
translation.ko: 백인들이 도심지를 떠나 교외로 이주하는 걸 뜻해

translation.en: -Why are they fleeing? -[Ian] Because they're uncultured.
[man] It has nothing to do with culture.

translation.ko: 저게 뭐지? 창밖 좀 봐 - 여보? - 창밖을 보라고

translation.en: -[Neve] At the window! -[man] Can't see anything.
translation.ko: - 여보? - 창밖을 보라고 아무것도 안 보이는데

translation.en: Something's coming. Someone's there. Can't you see?
[Amanda] Hey! Oh, look at you! I love your hair like that.
translation.ko: - 왔니? - 어서 오렴 어머나, 머리를 예쁘게 했구나

translation.en: Who did your hair like that?
I think it's time we made a move. Was lovely.
[Amanda] Yes. Wouldn't want to overstay our welcome.
translation.ko: - 저녁 잘 먹었어요 - 그래, 너무 오래 있어도 실례지
잘 자, 우리 딸 잘 자렴

translation.en: -[door shuts] -[Neve] What time does basketball finish?
[Ian] He attended basketball. Had a great game, apparently.
translation.ko: 아들이 농구 경기를 했는데 경기가 잘 풀렸나 봐요

translation.en: Uh, the others went for some food after to celebrate the win,
translation.ko: 다른 애들은 승리한 기념으로 뭐 먹으러 갔고

translation.en: There are people out to hurt us. Out to bring violence against us.
translation.ko: 우릴 해치려는 사람들이 있어 폭력을 행사하려는 거야

translation.en: Who's out to bring violence against us?
What is wrong with you tonight? Really?
You know how these things are.
Young boy's meeting a girl after a good game, on the quiet.
translation.ko: 남자애가 경기 후에 남몰래 어떤 여자애를 만나는 거죠

translation.en: Eh, Ian? Doesn't want anyone pulling the rug from under his feet.
translation.ko: 그렇죠, 이언? 누가 괜히 계획을 망칠까 봐요

translation.en: [man] Tell you what. I'll head out now and do another round of the town.
translation.ko: 그럼 전 나가서 마을을 한 바퀴 더 돌아볼게요

translation.en: -I'm sure he'll turn up. -[Ian] Thanks, Ken.
ten minutes from the village of Santa María de Nieva, is still on the…
translation.ko: 산타 마리아 데 니에바에서 10분 거리에 있으며 아직 팔리지 않았습니다

translation.en: [TV] We've come ten minutes up the valley from where we just were,
and we've got a detached house.
Where the hell have you been?!
Out? You, you didn't call. You didn't leave a message.
[Sebastian] Well, I'm back now, so just chill!
[Sebastian] Ah! Mum, fucking what you doing?!
In fact, just let him go.
Did you see him give Sebastian the cigarette?
translation.ko: 서배스천한테 담배 주는 걸 직접 보셨어요?

translation.en: Well, where else did he get them?
[hesitates] Uh, uh, I'm, I'm just saying,
you know, if we're to go through the proper channels.
translation.ko: 적절한 절차를 거치는 게 좋을 것 같아요

translation.en: Otherwise, you know, it could seem like I'm… like we're…
Well, a formal warning will suffice for now.
translation.ko: 일단은 정식 경고로 충분할 것 같네요

translation.en: ♪ Not by the token Of this faltering breath ♪
Okay, you know the drill. Don't panic. Mary, start the line.
translation.ko: 어떻게 해야 할지 알지? 당황하지 마라 메리, 앞장서렴

translation.en: Nice and ordered. Come along now, quickly. Quickly, quickly. Let's go.
Guys, carry on straight down into the outer grounds,
I'm just doing a toilet check.
You tried to get me fired.
-You want me gone? -Please, it's not what you think.
translation.ko: - 내가 사라지길 원해요? - 그런 거 아니에요

translation.en: You erased us! We thought you were dead!
translation.ko: 당신은 우릴 지웠고 우린 당신이 죽은 줄 알았어!

translation.en: It's not me! I'm not her!
translation.ko: 그건 내가 아니야 난 그 사람이 아니라고!

translation.en: So lovely to see you both. Thank you for coming.
translation.ko: 두 분 다 보니 좋네요 와 주셔서 감사해요

translation.en: -[Neve] Oh, thank you. -Thanks so much. -[Neve] Really appreciate… -So nice.
[Neve] Of course. My pleasure. Hello, darling.
-[Ian] Excuse me. Ready to speak? -[Neve] Yes, two minutes. You okay, babe?
translation.ko: - 여보 - 잠시만요, 준비됐어? 응, 2분 후에 할 거야 - 자기 괜찮지? - 응, 응원할게

translation.en: -[Neve] All looking wonderful! -[woman] It's all marvelous.
translation.ko: - 어머, 다들 근사하시네요 - 니브, 왔군요 - 참 멋진 행사예요 - 감사해요

translation.en: -[Neve] Thank you. Cakes look delicious. -Thank you.
translation.ko: - 참 멋진 행사예요 - 감사해요 - 케이크가 먹음직스럽던데요? - 고마워요

translation.en: A massive thank you to you all for making generous contributions,
translation.ko: 아낌없이 기부해 주신 모든 분들께 정말 감사드려요

translation.en: Today, we dedicate our time to those less fortunate,
translation.ko: 오늘 우리는 불우한 이웃들을 위해 이렇게 모였습니다

translation.en: where access to the basics becomes a gargantuan struggle.
Where simple eye or ear infections
can lead to blindness and deafness.
When a simple course of antibiotics
could afford that child a life of seeing the sunrise
translation.ko: 그 아이는 평생 일출을 볼 수 있고

translation.en: As an ode to these unfortunate individuals,
our very own choir will perform "The Dream of Gerontius" in sign.
The journey of a dead man's soul.
♪ Jesu, Maria, I am near to death ♪
translation.ko: 예수여, 마리아여 저는 죽음 앞에 와 있습니다

translation.en: ♪ Jesu, Maria, I am near to death ♪
translation.ko: 예수여, 마리아여 저는 죽음 앞에 와 있습니다

translation.en: ♪ Not by the token Of this faltering breath ♪
[becoming muted] ♪ This dampness on my brow ♪
translation.ko: 땀에 젖은 이마 때문이 아니라는 걸

translation.en: What kind of sordid, messed-up game are you playing?
You, you turn up out of the blue and, and pollute the environment.
translation.ko: 갑자기 불쑥 나타나서는 내 삶을 망치려 들어?

translation.en: No! No, we will not play your messed-up, twisted game anymore.
translation.ko: 안 돼! 우린 너희의 비열하고 뒤틀린 게임에 엮이지 않을 거야

translation.en: ♪ Everybody wants to know Where 'Walk in the Park' is ♪ ♪ Walk in the party, sporting Armani ♪ ♪ Half of the crowd's All snorting my Charlie ♪
♪ Sorted the bar Time to sort the punani ♪ ♪ Chicks looking at me Like, "Talk to me, darlin'" ♪ -♪ Jheeze ♪ -♪ Hollering at man ♪
-♪ Pour me a drink, big fur jacket… ♪ -Hey.
Hi. Um… How can I help you?
I've still got my first teddy.
translation.ko: 나도 첫 곰 인형을 아직 갖고 있어요

translation.en: Two singles if you have it. Please.
How long are you thinking of staying?
You'll have to iron it. Make it look nice.
translation.ko: 그거 다려야 할 거야, 그래야 예뻐

translation.en: I wouldn't get your hopes up.
[TV narrator] Mrs. John Q. Public no longer finds housework…
translation.ko: 아무개 부인은 이제 집안일을 하지 않습니다

translation.en: -Nothing. -Thanks to a host of labor-saving devices.
translation.ko: 아무거나 노동을 덜어주는 기기들이 있기 때문이죠

translation.en: Can't wait until it gets to tomorrow.
-[girl] Oh my! Hansel, look! -[Hansel] Wow! What is it?
translation.ko: 헨젤, 저것 좀 봐! 와, 저게 뭐지?

translation.en: -[Hansel] I'm gonna try some. -[girl] Me too!
It's bringing it all together, my time here.
translation.ko: 내가 여기서 보낸 시간을 총정리하는 의미도 있어

translation.en: [Amanda] And a chance to show off the new kitchen?
[Ian] Let's see. What kind of experience do you have?
translation.ko: "형제 보험" 봅시다, 어떤 경력을 갖고 있죠?

translation.en: I haven't been down to London in a while.
translation.ko: 난 런던에 간 지도 한참 됐어요

translation.en: [man] The school has a great history.
It was commissioned by Queen Victoria.
I worked a few period buildings abroad.
translation.ko: 해외의 유서 깊은 건물들에서 일한 적 있어요

translation.en: Some of my best days were sat in the Kop end,
translation.ko: 콥 엔드에 앉아 제 인생 최고의 날들을 보냈죠

translation.en: 20,000 strong, sucking the ball into the back of the net.
translation.ko: 골대 뒤 2만 명의 뜨거운 응원에 골이 그물에 와서 꽂히더라고요

translation.en: Hey. The only color that matters.
I saw your photograph. In the shop.
-I'm working there until I get on my feet. -Okay.
translation.ko: 독립할 때까지 거기서 일할 거야 그렇구나

translation.en: -My dad certainly thinks so. -I like your hair.
translation.ko: - 우리 아빠는 그렇게 생각해 - 머리 예쁘다

translation.en: I sometimes rock mine like that.
Cool. Uh… I'm still refining it, but yeah.
translation.ko: 멋지다, 난 아직 길들이는 중이긴 하지만

translation.en: I'll Facebook you. You got an alias?
Um, not quite an alias. Just Mary.
Williams. With a hashtag at the end.
translation.ko: 닉네임까지는 아니고 그냥 메리 윌리엄스인데 끝에 # 붙여

translation.en: [Carl, middle-class accent] A parking ticket, yes. Exactly.
What address is the vehicle registered to?
I share the car with my wife, and we recently had a breakup, you see.
translation.ko: 아내랑 차를 같이 쓰는데 최근에 헤어졌거든요

translation.en: I'll just tear up the ticket. Great.
-She hasn't accepted my request. -Just be patient.
translation.ko: - 아직 친구 수락을 안 했어 - 기다려 봐

translation.en: I can't look at her photos unless she accepts it!
translation.ko: 걔가 수락을 안 하면 사진을 못 본다고!

translation.en: Don't forget why we came here. You get?
translation.ko: 우리가 여기 왜 왔는지 잊지 마 알겠어?

translation.en: [Neve] So, yes, I'd just had tea with Amanda, and I…
translation.ko: 그래, 어맨다랑 차를 마시고 나서… "애비게일 존슨: 내일 만날래?"

translation.en: [Neve] No phones at the table, Mary.
Where's your mum at? Been dreaming about her.
translation.ko: 니네 엄마 어딨어? 나 니네 엄마 꿈 꿨는데

translation.en: [patronizingly] Ooh! Let me know when you're ready to man up, freak.
translation.ko: 남자답게 붙을 준비 되면 말해 괴짜 새끼야

translation.en: -[Neve] Off to class with you. -[bully] Fuckin' inbreds.
translation.ko: - 어서 교실로 가 - 재수 없는 새끼

translation.en: -It's what happens when you're different. -[Neve] Sebas.
translation.ko: 남들과 다르면 그런 일이 생기지 서배스

translation.en: It's kinda shit when your mum's the deputy head.
[Carl] Shouldn't let people treat you like that.
translation.ko: 널 막 대하게 둬선 안 돼

translation.en: -You got a light? -Uh… I didn't think that…
translation.ko: 불 있어? - 그건 생각을 못… - 농담이야
그러면 막을 수 있는 줄 아나 봐 그렇지?

translation.en: [tuts] Oh, you… Take that down, man. Yo, like this.
[Neve] Who? This is the game you wanna play with me?
-[Sebastian] I bought them. -[Neve] Don't treat me like a fool!
translation.ko: - 제가 샀어요 - 내가 바보인 줄 알아?

translation.en: Brotherly Cover, how can I help?
-See you later. -[Neve] Jessie's dropping you back?
[Mary irritably] Yes, Mum. Yes. Love you. Bye.
[Dione] Good. I'm good. I'm excited for this party.
[Carl] Did good, man. You did good.
Thanks, man. And I thought it was dope when you whistled.
translation.ko: 고마워요 마빈이 휘파람 불 때 진짜 멋졌어요

translation.en: First time for everything. Ain't no shame in that.
translation.ko: 뭐든 처음이 있는 법이야 부끄러워할 거 없어

translation.en: Yo, this is some Alice-in-Wonderland shit.
[slurring] Let us see what's in here.
Pick what you want. Try anything.
translation.ko: 맘에 드는 거 골라서 입어 봐

translation.en: Just look at all these cakes. We're like…
translation.ko: 이 케이크들 좀 봐, 우리 꼭…

translation.en: -You'd look killer in it. -I'll wear it to prom.
translation.ko: - 진짜 잘 어울릴 거야 - 댄스파티 때 입을래

translation.en: -Prom like in the movies? -Yeah. You never been to one?
translation.ko: - 영화에 나오는 그런 거? - 응 한 번도 안 가 봤어?

translation.en: It'll be fussy, but there'll be a lot of free food and drink. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 좀 딱딱한 분위기지만 공짜 음식이랑 술이 많을 거야

translation.en: [US accent] What do you reckon, homie?
I bet you've always… been the favorite.
And sings to you when you sleep, doesn't she?
[angrily] And that makes it all right when the meanies are out and about.
Just got to go to the bathroom.
[Sebastian] So, what brings you to Combe?
[Carl] Thought I'd add some color to the place.
[Sebastian chuckles] Yeah, there ain't no other Blacks around.
No. I mean, I guess I'm kinda…
Thinks she's white. Never says anything about her past.
translation.ko: 자기가 백인인 줄 알고 과거 얘긴 전혀 안 해요
뭐? 흑인과 관련된 건 다 금지고요

translation.en: Shit, man. This weed is strong.
[Carl] You think you'd survive that drop?
translation.ko: 여기서 떨어지면 살 수 있을 것 같아?

translation.en: Do you think you'd survive it?
Lean over the edge and have a look.
-Why? -I thought you were on this man shit!
Now you're ready for the next level.
-You need to stop picking on my bro. -[whimpering]
[Carl] Do it, Sebas. Do it now!
[Carl] What the fuck are you waiting for?
Nothing's wrong with me, okay? I'm done pretending.
translation.ko: 난 아무 문제 없다고 이제 연기 못 해먹겠어

translation.en: We should up and leave now.
[Dione] We've been invited to the gala.
I never got to go to prom.
translation.ko: 난 댄스파티에 가 본 적 없어

translation.en: Sure you wanna go through with this?
This is all you! It's all you!
Get off me! It's all you!
No, you didn't let me get one day!
It looks to me like your two Black children just showed…
translation.ko: 당신 자식인 흑인 애 둘이 갑자기 나타났잖아

translation.en: "See?" This is somehow on me? You're, you're, you're gonna explain…
translation.ko: 이게 내 탓이란 거야? 당신 제대로 설명…

translation.en: -[Sebastian] Why didn't you tell us? -They grew up with their father. He…
translation.ko: - 왜 말 안 하셨어요? - 쟤들은 아빠랑 살았어

translation.en: He was a bad man. I…
I had to escape, so I, I, I, just…
-This is so, so fucked! -Let her explain. Mum, tell us how…
translation.ko: 개 같은 상황이라고요! 엄마 말 들어 봐 엄마, 어떻게 된 거예요?

translation.en: Don't make out you would have been up for raising
translation.ko: 당신 자식도 아닌 흑인 아이 둘을

translation.en: two Black children who weren't yours, Ian!
I did what I had to do.
What fathers do all the time.
No, they haven't gone about things conventionally.
There is something that I have to do.
[woman] Hey. Can I get you guys anything?
Just let me know when your third party arrives.
Have you ordered anything? Is there anything you want?
translation.ko: 뭐 주문했니? 먹고 싶은 거 있어?

translation.en: -Thanks for agreeing to meet with me. -[woman] Hey, team!
Specials are at the bottom. Can I get you anything to drink?
translation.ko: 특별 메뉴는 아래 있고 음료 주문하시겠어요?

translation.en: -We don't stock alcohol… -Just… Maybe just some tea.
translation.ko: - 여긴 술 안 팔아요 - 그냥 차 주세요

translation.en: -I hardly recognized you. -What happened to your accent?
translation.ko: 못 알아볼 정도야 - 말투가 왜 그래요? - 흑인인 게 싫어요?
- 말투가 왜 그래요? - 흑인인 게 싫어요? 아니야

translation.en: No, no, I'm a proud Black woman.
I'm so sorry for my outburst. I…
I don't know what came over me.
I've been under the most amount of stress, and…
That's what I'm here to do.
[spluttering] It hasn't been a straightforward journey.
There have been things that have happened that…
You said you were going to the hairdressers, 18 years ago.
-Your father, he was a very dangerous man. -You weren't exactly perfect either.
translation.ko: - 네 아버지는 위험한 사람이었어 - 엄마도 완벽하진 않았어요

translation.en: I don't know if you remember what it was like.
translation.ko: 네가 콜드하버에서 살던 때를 기억하는지 모르겠구나
네가 콜드하버에서 살던 때를 기억하는지 모르겠구나 - 유도 질문이에요? - 아니야

translation.en: -Why didn't you take us with you? -I left you with your auntie.
translation.ko: 우리를 안 데려갔어요? 난 너희를 이모한테 맡겼어

translation.en: She gave us away. She didn't want us.
translation.ko: 이모는 우리를 버렸어요 우릴 원하지 않았죠

translation.en: [woman] Careful, guys! The tea is super hot.
-Don't want anybody to scald themselves. -Would you fuck off!
I should have written. I should have reached out.
I can't imagine what you must think of me. I'm still struggling to process it myself.
translation.ko: 너희가 날 어떻게 생각할지 상상도 안 돼 나조차도 받아들이기가 힘드니까

translation.en: Are we… going to move in?
And I've been thinking of how I can make things right.
translation.ko: 이 상황을 바로잡을 방법을 생각해 봤는데

translation.en: And it appears to me that, right now,
it's important that you both are able to get back on your feet.
translation.ko: 너희 둘이 자립하는 게 중요할 것 같아

translation.en: I wish I could give more.
Maybe I can. Down the line.
translation.ko: 중간중간 더 줄 수 있을 거야

translation.en: If you go back to London,
it will give you a chance to get back on your feet.
translation.ko: 자립할 수 있는 기반이 될 거야

translation.en: Until we can find a way to work it all out.
translation.ko: 이 상황을 정리할 방법을 찾을 때까지

translation.en: I've broken it down into two separate checks
[Neve] There's no excuse for my behavior.
Who knows what would have happened if I'd stayed?
translation.ko: 내가 남았으면 어떻게 됐을지 누가 알겠어?

translation.en: I saw an opportunity, and I went for it.
All this is just restless curiosity.
translation.ko: 이건 그냥 호기심 때문에 벌어진 일이야

translation.en: People need to know who they are.
Where they're from. Like… on those programs.
translation.ko: 자기 뿌리를 찾는 거지 그 TV 프로그램에서처럼

translation.en: -Will we ever see them again? -Don't you even want to?
translation.ko: - 다시 볼 일이 있을까요? - 보고 싶지 않으세요?

translation.en: We need to heal a bit first.
Now it's important to rebuild our defenses
and remember that we love each other.
Whatever happened before doesn't change that.
translation.ko: 과거에 무슨 일이 있었든 그건 변하지 않아

translation.en: There will be many more conversations to come.
translation.ko: 앞으로 많은 대화를 해야 할 거야

translation.en: [TV narrator] Together, they can better defend their territory.
translation.ko: 힘을 합치면 자신들의 영역을 더 잘 지킬 수 있죠

translation.en: Now this is… Gosh, this is…
It is one of the nicest…
Oh my gosh, look at this ring!
-[Dione] Think I might have a bath. -[Carl] Have you got a clean towel?
translation.ko: 목욕이나 할까 봐 깨끗한 수건 있어?

translation.en: [Neve] What are you doing, taking a bath at this hour?
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 이 시간에 목욕하려고?

translation.en: [Carl] Know where the clean towels are kept?
[Dione] I checked the cupboards but couldn't find any clean ones.
translation.ko: 욕실장 확인해 봤는데 깨끗한 게 없더라

translation.en: You never mentioned you were coming round.
We thought it would be a great idea to bring it in together.
-Didn't mean to wake you. -[Dione] Hey, M!
-Please, I know how you must be… -[Dione] Where do you keep clean towels?
translation.ko: - 어떤 기분일지 아는데… - 깨끗한 수건은 어디에 둬요?

translation.en: [Carl] Is it washday, Mum? Ian, washday?
translation.ko: 빨래하는 날이에요, 엄마? 이언, 빨래하는 날이에요?

translation.en: We'll do it like that. On me.
I like the hair. You bringing it back to the '90s?
I'm going Singapore noodle and sweet-and-sour chicken.
Mary, go and get the house phone so we can put the order in.
I was totally unaware of what happened in the past with Neve…
translation.ko: 니브랑 과거에 어떤 일이 있었는지 나는 전혀 몰랐고…

translation.en: Oh… It was a terrible mix-up.
It's all just been a terrible confusion. I mean, I…
We don't condone what she did.
We demanded answers too, like the two of you.
Now you, Sebas. I seen you on the court. I know you got an appetite.
translation.ko: 서배스, 농구장에서 봐서 잘 먹는 거 알아

translation.en: Gonna be a feast. I like.
I clocked a gym back there.
[mocking disbelief] A gym, you know? In the house.
We should do a family photograph.
[Carl] After we sorted the order, we can do a family photo.
But it's my turn to be in the middle.
-I'll just have a bit of everyone else's. -You sure? I'm buying.
translation.ko: - 난 조금씩 덜어 먹을게 - 정말요? 내가 사는 건데

translation.en: [shakily] Shall I turn the water off?
[machine] I'm sorry, but we're currently closed.
Our opening hours are 12:00 to 11:00, Monday to Sunday. Please call back later.
translation.ko: 영업시간은 정오부터 11시까지 월요일부터 일요일까지입니다 나중에 다시 전화해 주세요

translation.en: They got Uber Eats in Castle Combe? Ian.
translation.ko: 캐슬 쿰에 우버 이츠 있지? 이언?

translation.en: Take my phone, Mary. You find a Chinese.
Now… I know you must be hurting…
-Would you repeat? -I know you must be in pain…
[Mary] Yep. I found a good one. [Carl] That's my girl.
[Dione] Aren't you gonna wish me happy birthday?
[Carl] Come on. It's her fucking birthday.
Well, don't just stand there. Sing!
-[Neve] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Dione ♪ -[others] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Abi ♪
We got no board game ting.
-We must've missed a fair few board games. -[Dione] Mmm.
How many birthdays is that anyway? Fifteen?
Yes, I believe we have Scrabble somewhere.
[Carl] Sebas. You go with Abs and find the board game while we set the table up.
translation.ko: 서배스 우리가 식탁 준비할 동안 앱스랑 게임 찾아봐

translation.en: Set the fucking table, will ya?
Did you write the check or did she?
translation.ko: 수표는 당신이 썼어요? 아님 저 여자가 썼어요?

translation.en: The 20K she just tried to buy us off with.
You tried to pay them off?
We could have given more. I was just trying to help.
translation.ko: 더 줄 수도 있었어 난 도우려고 한 거야

translation.en: Neve, what the hell is wrong with you?
But what could I get for that? It's about a grand for each year, right?
translation.ko: 그럼 내가 얻는 게 뭐지? 1년에 천 파운드?

translation.en: Wetting the bed until just recently.
What you buying back with yours, Abs?
translation.ko: 넌 그 돈으로 뭐 한댔지, 앱스?

translation.en: And all the things they've done.
[Carl yelling] You do that, sis! You do exactly that!
This has always been a family favorite.
Seems the perfect way to introduce Carl and Dione to the flock.
translation.ko: 칼과 디온을 가족으로 들일 완벽한 방법인 것 같아

translation.en: I see now, this is as it should be, isn't it?
With all of us gathered around.
[Sebastian] Mum? Dad? What have you got?
Let's see, what word do we have here? Ian?
[quavers] Yeah. [fakes positivity] What have we got?
Let me know when you want to do that photograph, Dione.
translation.ko: 사진 찍고 싶을 때 말하렴, 디온

translation.en: [Dione] I wanna play the game! It's my birthday! I get to choose!
translation.ko: 난 게임 하고 싶어 내 생일이니까 내가 정해

translation.en: -[Neve] I'm sure we can find another game. -Me and Ian are gonna do a little workout.
translation.ko: 다른 게임이 있을 거야 나랑 이언은 운동을 좀 할 거야

translation.en: [Carl] What kinda KG you pushing these days?
Must be more than a bit.
[Neve chuckling] Aren't you funny? Yes, something like that.
Not sure I've delivered here before. Nice house.
We didn't think we'd find anywhere, what with it being so late.
translation.ko: 시간이 너무 늦어서 주문할 곳이 없을 줄 알았어요

translation.en: Let me get you a tip for being so accommodating.
translation.ko: 늦은 시간에 와 주셨으니 팁 드릴게요

translation.en: -You ain't walking away that easy. -[Ian gurgles]
You made your bed with us.
I'm very sorry for how this has turned out.
I hope one day you can forgive me.
Let me tip the man, and then we'll eat and discuss.
translation.ko: 배달부한테 팁 주고 먹으면서 얘기 나누자
